flexibleContent.heading: Xamarin is one of the widely used framework owned by Microsoft for building cross platform mobile applications on iOS and Android.

contentLists.content: Xamarin offers a seamless user interface
Has amazing controls and behaviour is seamless
Xamarin is an open source framework
Support for Xamarin is amazing
Assures upto 40% faster app development

flexibleContent.heading: Backed by experienced developers, Techtic is a top Xamarin app development company that utilizes this cross-platform framework's abilities to help companies build apps smartly.

contentLists.heading: Xamarin App Consultation
contentLists.content: Understand how you can save more, what agile development is, and the perks of Xamarin during a one-on-one consultation with our technology experts.

contentLists.heading: Xamarin User Experience Design
contentLists.content: Using pre-made or customized beautiful XAML templates, we ensure you a smooth and attractive user interface that looks identical across platforms.

contentLists.heading: Android & iOS App Development
contentLists.content: Achieve native performance on Android and iOS with Xamarin mobile app development, leveraging up to 90% code sharing and saving more with us.

contentLists.heading: Cross Platform App Development
contentLists.content: We help companies be available wherever their customers are by coding once and using it to build mobile, tablet, and desktop apps in a short amount of time.

contentLists.heading: Xamarin for Enterprise Development
contentLists.content: As you scale your business, our Xamarin app development services will help you build robust yet flexible applications designed to scale your operations efficiently.

contentLists.heading: Xamarin Migration & Upgradation
contentLists.content: We ensure you make the best out of the technology by securely migrating from existing infrastructure or upgrading your Xamarin cross-platform app with the latest version.

contentLists.heading: Xamarin App Maintenance & Support
contentLists.content: Our Xamarin app development company always stands by your side to help you overcome any shortcomings and provide an unbreakable user experience.

contentLists.heading: Will you help me to upload my Xamarin mobile app on the App Stores (Google Play Store and Apple App Store)?
contentLists.content: Yes, why not. Our Xamarin app development team uploads your Xamarin app on the App stores, including Apple App store and Google Play store.

contentLists.heading: How can I track the progress of my Xamarin app?
contentLists.content: It’s very simple as always. Our Xamarin app development team provides build to clients at every decided milestone stage. Also, we are also open to your preferred medium to communicate.

contentLists.heading: What are the top 10 apps are built with Xamarin?
contentLists.content:
• Olo – Online Food Ordering Platform
  • The World Bank – Survey Conducting App
  • Storyo – Video story creator from images
  • FreshDirect – Online Food Grocery
  • Just Giving – Philanthropic Interface
  • SuperGiant Games – A PC-Game Compatible with Mobile Devices
  • Thermo Fisher Scientific – Research and Development
  • Insightly – CRM and Project Management
  • APX – Environmental Asset Tracker
  • Skulls of the Shogun – Gaming App

contentLists.heading: Is Xamarin good for mobile app development?
contentLists.content: Xamarin is one of the most effective cross platform mobile app development tool which enables app developers to use common coding across various platforms. Xamarin provides 60% to 95% of reusable code with native performance which makes the whole app development quick and cost-effective.

contentLists.heading: What steps are followed for Xamarin app development process by your company?
contentLists.content:
Our Xamarin app development process:

  • Phase I – Kickoff Meeting
  • Phase II – Project Management & Resource Allocation.
  • Phase III – Mockup Design
  • Phase IV – Agile Development – Programming& Quality Assurance
  • Phase VII – Final Deployment

contentLists.heading: How much does it cost to develop a Xamarin app?
contentLists.content: The development cost of Xamarin application is totally depends upon on the requirements of the project. To know the exact details of the cost to develop a Xamarin app, get in touch with us to get estimated budget-friendly pricing or you can email us at info@techtic.com.

contentLists.heading: How much time does it require to build a Xamarin app?
contentLists.content: To be honest, it depends. It depends upon the size of your Xamarin app development project and factors like integration, features, and functionalities you want to have in your Xamarin application. To precisely understand in-detail please, you can email us your project requirement at info@techtic.com or directly get in touch us today.

contentLists.heading: Which methodologies and tools do you use for Xamarin project management?
contentLists.content:
We are using Agile project development methodology for meeting deadlines. Meanwhile, we also use cutting-edge project management tools to monitor and manage every phase of Xamarin app development.

  • Jira
  • Basecamp
  • Trello
  • Slack

contentLists.heading: Is there any process you follow to keep my Xamarin app idea confidential?
contentLists.content: Yes, we sign NDA agreement for keep your Xamarin app idea confidential.
